title: Remove all mockup and placeholder data from the application

requirements.text: Remove all mock data from frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx including hardcoded land records, pending transfers, and recent activity arrays, replacing them with actual data from useQueries hooks or empty state components when no data exists
acceptanceCriteria: DashboardPage.tsx contains no hardcoded mock data arrays
All displayed data comes from React Query hooks or shows empty states
Loading states correctly handle the transition from loading to empty/populated states

requirements.text: Remove all mock data fallbacks from frontend/src/pages/PropertyDetailsPage.tsx including hardcoded ownership history, document lists, and verification status, ensuring the component only displays data from backend queries or shows appropriate empty states
acceptanceCriteria: PropertyDetailsPage.tsx contains no mock data fallbacks
Component displays only real data from queries or empty state messaging
Error handling is in place for missing or invalid property IDs

requirements.text: Remove all mock data from frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx including hardcoded search results arrays, replacing them with actual search query results or empty state displays when no properties match the search criteria
acceptanceCriteria: SearchPage.tsx contains no mock search results
Search results come exclusively from backend search queries
Empty state is shown when searches return no results

requirements.text: Remove any stubbed or mock responses from frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts, ensuring all query hooks make genuine calls to the backend actor without fallback mock data
acceptanceCriteria: useQueries.ts contains no mock data or stubbed responses
All queries attempt to fetch real data from the backend actor
Error states are properly handled when backend calls fail

requirements.text: Add appropriate empty state components to DashboardPage.tsx, SearchPage.tsx, and PropertyDetailsPage.tsx that display user-friendly messages and call-to-action buttons when no data is available
acceptanceCriteria: Each page has a dedicated empty state component with clear messaging
Empty states include helpful CTAs (e.g., 'Register your first property')
Empty states match the refined design system with proper spacing and typography

constraints: Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui components
Preserve all existing React Query configurations including refetch intervals and optimistic updates
Maintain the refined design system including colors, shadows, spacing, and animations
nonGoals: Adding new backend functionality or data models
Changing the authentication flow or Internet Identity integration
Modifying the routing structure or navigation components
Implementing new features beyond removing mock data
